title: Bank of Canada Leaves Benchmark Interest Rate Unchanged, Will Slow Pace of Bond Buying
sub_head: Central bank holds overnight interest rate steady at 0.25%
body:
OTTAWAâ€”The Bank of Canada left its benchmark overnight interest rate unchanged at 0.25% as it pulled forward its guidance on when it could next raise the key rate and announced plans to slow the pace of its bond buying in light of an improved economic outlook.
